videoRecorder.unable_to_access_camera_or_mic_1: [BG] Unable to access camera or mic 1

instructions.dialog: Press Escape to close this dialog
instructions.form: Use Tab to navigate between fields, Enter to submit
instructions.menu: Use arrow keys to navigate menu items
instructions.table: Use arrow keys to navigate table cells

changes.discard: Discard all changes and return to the previous page?
changes.reset: Reset all fields to their original values?
changes.unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?

delete.account: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All data will be permanently removed.
delete.asset: Are you sure you want to remove this asset? This action cannot be undone.
delete.document: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.
delete.person: Are you sure you want to remove this person from your trusted circle?
delete.will: Are you sure you want to delete this will? This action cannot be undone.

share.vault: Give {{name}} access to your vault information?

assets.accountNumbers: Only enter the last 4 digits for security - full numbers are encrypted
assets.beneficiaries: List primary and backup beneficiaries for this asset
assets.estimatedValue: Provide your best estimate - this helps your family understand importance
assets.importance: High priority assets are shown first to your family
assets.jointOwnership: Include information about any co-owners or joint accounts
assets.liabilities: Note any debts, mortgages, or liens against this asset
assets.location: Be specific enough for your family to locate this asset

documents.copies: Keep copies in multiple secure locations
documents.expiration: Set reminders for documents that need periodic renewal
documents.organization: Group similar documents together for easy family access
documents.originals: Note where original documents are stored physically
documents.scanning: High-quality scans are often acceptable for most purposes
documents.sharing: Share documents with people who need access to help your family

family.access: Grant access based on what each person needs to know to help
family.backups: Always designate backup people in case your first choice cannot serve
family.communication: Ensure your trusted circle knows how to contact each other
family.instructions: Provide clear guidance about their responsibilities and your wishes
family.roles: One person can have multiple roles, or you can assign different people
family.trustedCircle: Choose people who are reliable, trustworthy, and willing to help

forms.emailFormat: We'll use this email for important account notifications
forms.encryptedData: This information will be encrypted and secure
forms.passwordStrength: Use at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
forms.phoneFormat: Include country code for international numbers

will.executor: Select someone who is organized, trustworthy, and willing to serve
will.guardians: Consider the guardian's values, lifestyle, and ability to care for children
will.jurisdiction: Ensure your will complies with laws in your state or country
will.storage: Inform your executor where your will is stored
will.updates: Review and update your will when major life events occur
will.witnesses: Choose witnesses who are not beneficiaries in your will

specific.emergencyContact: e.g., Adult child or close friend
specific.executorName: e.g., Trusted family member or friend
specific.guardianName: e.g., Relative or close family friend

empty.emptyVault: Your vault is empty - add your first asset to get started
empty.noFamily: No trusted circle members added yet

retry.you_are_offline_operations_will_continue: You are offline. Operations will continue when connection is restored.

assets.account: Account information will be encrypted and secure
assets.documents: Upload related documents like deeds or policies
assets.importance: Mark as high priority for your family
assets.location: Where your family can find this asset
assets.notes: Important information your family should know
assets.sharing: Control which family members can access this information
assets.value: Enter the current estimated value of this asset

documents.access: Who needs access to this document
documents.category: Organize documents by type for easy finding
documents.copies: How many copies exist and where they are
documents.expiry: When this document needs to be renewed
documents.importance: Mark critical documents your family needs first
documents.location: Where the original document is stored

family.access: What information they can see and when
family.backup: Who should replace them if they cannot serve
family.contact: How to reach this person in an emergency
family.instructions: Special guidance for this person's role
family.relationship: How this person is connected to your family
family.role: What responsibilities this person will have
family.trustedPerson: Someone who can help your family during emergencies

security.access: Control who can see this information
security.encryption: Your data is protected with bank-level encryption
security.privacy: This information is private and secure
security.session: Your session will expire for security
security.twoFactor: Add an extra layer of security to your account
security.verification: Verify your identity for account security

passwordWall.security: This application is protected by a password for security
passwordWall.session: Your session will expire when you close the browser
passwordWall.access: Access is granted for this browser session only
passwordWall.logout: Click to logout and return to the password screen

will.copies: Provide copies to your executor and attorney
will.executor: The person who will manage your estate
will.guardian: Who will care for your minor children
will.notary: May be required depending on your location
will.storage: Keep your will in a secure, accessible location
will.witness: Required for legal validity in your jurisdiction
